segments.text: What kind of books do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like reading novels about early America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which one do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I prefer the novels by Hemingway , such as The Old Man and the Sea . I like the simple words in his novels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup . Though the words he used are simple , but the spirit he has conveyed is great .
segments.speaker: S2
